b'Happy 16th Birthday to $BGR, the BlackRock Energy and Resources Trust!\n\nFunny little fund that sticks to the global oil and gas industry and overwrites its positions with call options on individual stocks.  Will have an in-depth write up on this and other CEFs in the new year.'
